input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Taylor Stitch"
Reference Product Name: "The Organic Cotton Shop Tee"
Reference Product Description:
The heavyweight champ of our tailored tee shirt lineup, The Organic Cotton Shop Tee is crafted from a burly organic cotton jersey with a subtle ribbed finish for increased stretch and comfort. Built to stand up to the most demanding of days, this one stays on hand all year long and gets better with every wear.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Faherty Men's Sunwashed Pocket Tee'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Sunwashed Pima Cotton T-Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Movement Short-Sleeve T-Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Women's Sunwashed Regenerative Essential T-Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Live in Alt Shell Sunwashed Pocket Tee'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Long-Sleeve Sunwashed Regenerative Cotton T-Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Sunwashed Pocket Tee'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Essential Organic V-Neck T-Shirt'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Premium-Weight Crew Neck T-Shirt'
  - Name='Pact Men's Organic Soft Cotton Coronet Short Sleeve Tee'
  - Name='Pact Men's Cool-Stretch V-Neck Undershirt 3-Pack'
  - Name='Pact Shirts Men's Organic Cotton Crewneck T Shirt'
  - Name='Everlane Essential Organic Garment-Dyed Polo T-Shirt'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Essential Organic Crew Neck T-Shirt'
  - Name='Pact Men's Organic Cotton Softspun Pocket Crew Tee - Blue - Short sleeve t-shirts'
  - Name='Pact Men's Solid Black Organic Cotton T-shirt'
  - Name='Outerknown "the Only Gun You Need" Surfboard T-shirt'
  - Name='Marine Layer Men's Signature Printed Pocket T-Shirt'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Premium-Weight Relaxed Crew Neck T-Shirt'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Cotton Linen T-Shirt'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Rec Long-Sleeve T-Shirt'
  - Name='Pact Men's Organic Cotton Stretch-Fit Crew Neck Undershirts (5-Pack)'
  - Name='PACT Men's Organic Cool Stretch V-Neck Undershirt'
  - Name='Allbirds Women's Natural Run Long Sleeve Tee'
  - Name='Allbirds Men's Natural Run Lightweight Shirt'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Sunwashed Pocket Tee
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same core product type (tee shirt) with similar casual style, but likely lighter fabric and added pocket detail, less emphasis on heavyweight or organic cotton.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Sunwashed Pima Cotton T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Organic and cotton-based tee shirt, similar use and purpose, but Pima cotton differs from heavyweight organic cotton jersey; likely softer, less heavy fabric.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Movement Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short-sleeve tee shirt, but designed for movement possibly with different fabric and fit, less focused on heavyweight organic cotton fabric.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Women's Sunwashed Regenerative Essential T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Womenâ€™s tee shirt, likely lighter weight and different fit; also regenerative cotton but less clearly heavyweight or with ribbed texture.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Live in Alt Shell Sunwashed Pocket Tee
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Tee shirt with pocket, but likely a different fit/style and fabric; less emphasis on heavyweight organic cotton and tailored fit.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Long-Sleeve Sunwashed Regenerative Cotton T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve tee with regenerative cotton, similar material focus but different sleeve length and possibly lighter fabric.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Sunwashed Pocket Tee
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar pocket tee shirt, likely casual wear with cotton fabric but not specified as heavyweight organic cotton.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Men's Essential Organic V-Neck T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Organic cotton and essential tee shirt, similar focus on fabric and organic materials, difference mainly v-neck versus crew and possibly weight.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Men's Premium-Weight Crew Neck T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Premium-weight crew neck tee closely matches heavyweight description, likely similar fabric weight and construction, very relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pact Men's Organic Soft Cotton Coronet Short Sleeve Tee
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Organic cotton tee with focus on softness rather than heavyweight, same short sleeve tee category, moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pact Men's Cool-Stretch V-Neck Undershirt 3-Pack
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Undershirt with cool-stretch fabric and v-neck design, functionally different from heavyweight tailored tee shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pact Shirts Men's Organic Cotton Crewneck T Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Organic cotton crewneck tee, similar style and fabric focus though no explicit heavyweight mention, quite relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Essential Organic Garment-Dyed Polo T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Polo shirt style differs notably in silhouette and intended use, though organic cotton is shared.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Men's Essential Organic Crew Neck T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Essential organic crew neck tee very similar in category and fabric focus, but unclear if heavyweight like reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pact Men's Organic Cotton Softspun Pocket Crew Tee - Blue - Short sleeve t-shirts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pocket crew tee shirt in organic cotton but softspun indicates lighter or softer fabric rather than heavyweight.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pact Men's Solid Black Organic Cotton T-shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Organic cotton tee shirt, solid design, likely similar silhouette but unclear on fabric weight; somewhat relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Outerknown "the Only Gun You Need" Surfboard T-shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: T-shirt likely casual wear, but may be lighter fabric optimized for surf lifestyle, less focused on heavyweight durability.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Marine Layer Men's Signature Printed Pocket T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pocket tee shirt, signature printed design implies lighter cotton and casual wear rather than heavy tailored tee.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Men's Premium-Weight Relaxed Crew Neck T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Premium-weight crew neck tee with relaxed fit aligns closely with heavyweight tailored tee, very relevant product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Men's Cotton Linen T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Blend of cotton and linen changes fabric texture and weight; less durable/heavyweight than pure organic cotton tee.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve tee shirt with possibly lighter fabric and different sleeve length; less similar to heavyweight short sleeve tee.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pact Men's Organic Cotton Stretch-Fit Crew Neck Undershirts (5-Pack)
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Undershirts with stretch fit differ functionally and likely in fabric weight from heavyweight tailored tee.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Women's long sleeve performance tee focused on running, different use case and lighter fabric.
